Backup, restore, download, and activate themes; and, get the status of theme jobs and read theme configurations.

- [OAuth Scopes](#oauth-scopes)
- [Authentication](#authentication)

## Authentication

Requests can be authenticated by sending an `access_token` via `X-Auth-Token` HTTP header.

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/themes
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Accept: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

### OAuth Scopes
| UI Name                                      | Permission | Parameter                                     |
|----------------------------------------------|------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| Themes                                       | modify     | `store_themes_manage`                         |
For more information on OAuth Scopes, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
